submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        MOD = 10**9 + 7
        MAX = max(nums)+1

        dp = [[-1 for _ in range(MAX)] for _ in range(len(nums))]
        for ind in range(len(nums))[::-1]:
            newaccu = [0]
            for n1 in range(MAX):
                if ind == len(nums)-1:
                    if n1 <= nums[ind]:
                        dp[ind][n1]=1
                    else:
                        dp[ind][n1]=0
                    newaccu.append(newaccu[-1]+dp[ind][n1])
                    continue
                res = 0
                #for j in range(max(nums[ind+1]-nums[ind],0)+n1,nums[ind+1]+1):
                #    res += dp[ind+1][j]
                res = accu[nums[ind+1]+1] - accu[min(max(nums[ind+1]-nums[ind],0)+n1,nums[ind+1]+1)]
                dp[ind][n1] = res
                newaccu.append(newaccu[-1]+res)
            accu = newaccu
            #print(dp)
            #print(accu)
        
        ans = 0
        for i in range(MAX):
            ans += dp[0][i]
        return ans%MOD
